comments.text: I just added my Galaxy Tab to my Sync account, and the bookmarks in my Bookmarks Toolbar on my laptop (Aurora 8) are now all out of order.

comments.raw_text:
Justin, which version of Fennec are you running on the Galaxy?

Can you provide sync logs from both devices? See

  https://philikon.wordpress.com/2011/06/13/how-to-file-a-good-sync-bug/

Thanks!

comments.raw_text:
Possibly a dupe of 708149.  

Justin, do you have things like smartmarks, livemarks, feeds or separators on your BM toolbar?  If so, look in your library.  Did all those things get pushed to the end of the BM Toolbar folder?
comments.text:
